bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of moisture generated internally following harm caused by beverages and food that manifests itself as inhibiting the functions of the organs of transporting and transforming water and other liquids. The moisture is retained in the body and may generate further disease. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Shi ji 十劑 , zao ji 燥劑 , preparations to achieve desiccation : 內傷之濕，生於水飲酒食及脾弱腎強 , “ Moisture resulting from inner harm originates internally from water, wine, and food, in conjunction with spleen weakness and kidney strength”.
